title: Global Operations
description: This course is designed to present issues critical to the globalization of operations, and addresses strategic and tactical issues pertaining to an organization's global operations and supply chain activities. Includes impact of technology, efficient vs responsive supply chains, and forecasting and sales and operations planning decisions.
